title: Together: A Story of Shared Vision
description: One misstep on a mountain climbing trip plunged Brenden into darkness by stealing his sight—and everything else he held dear. But an independent guide dog named Nelson might just bring him back to life . . . if they don't kick him out of guide dog school first.Twenty-two-year-old Brenden McCarthy feels like he’s lost everything. His fiancée. His independence. And his passion for life. All due to one mountain-climbing misstep that cost him his vision.But he’s about to gain the last thing he ever a big-hearted black Labrador named Nelson who’s given one last shot at being a Seeing Eye dog after his last two pairings failed.Both are beyond hope and resigned to live alone. And both are about to experience a bond of friendship that develops when they least expect it.Together is a heartwarming story for anyone who’s ever lost sight of what matters most in life . . . but has hope that there’s more.Full-length inspirational novelWritten with beloved actress and animal advocate Betty WhitePerfect for pet lovers who enjoy stories of hope, optimism, and trustContinue Brenden’s story in the Alive Day
author: Tom Sullivan
